quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Day and Halo Series
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, people, country. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of the following does the UNSC use to transport troops in the halo series?

There are these two country farmers milking their cows. While the one farmer is milking, a fly zooms into the cows ear. The cow starts jumping around, shaking its head and mooing. He tries to steady the cow and suddenly it settles down. He looks down and sees the

options.text: in one ear and out the other
in one ear and out the udder
ya win a few ya lose a few

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: in one ear and out the udder

questions.question: What is the lowest ranking species in the Covenant hierarchy in the Halo series?
There are two kinds of people who live on a mysterious island. They are the so-called Honestants, who always speak the truth, and the others are the Swindlecants, who always lie.

options.text: visitor to the island went to a local pub and had a few drinks. When he was ready to leave he asked the bartender how much he owed. The bartender told him the total for his bill. It was quite expensive, so he asked the bartender if he spoke the truth. But the visitor did not hear the whispered answer so he asked a man sitting next to him about it. And the man said: The bartender said yes, but he is a big liar.

questions.question: We know very little about the life of the mathematician Diophantus (called the father of algebra) except that he lived around the year 250 B.C. Due to one admirer of his, who described his life by the means of an algebraic riddle, we can at least determine his age at death:

options.text: ophantuss youth lasted 1/6 of his life. He had his first beard in the next 1/12 of his life. At the end of the following 1/7 of his life Diophantus got married. Five years from then his son was born. His son lived exactly 1/2 of Diophantuss life. Diophantus died 4 years after the death of his son.

questions.question: Who controls the Flood in the Halo series?
What does UNSC stand for in the Halo series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: United Nations Space Command

questions.question: You are on your way to visit your Grandma, who lives at the end of the valley. Its her birthday, and you want to give her the cakes youve made.

options.text: tween your house and her house, you have to cross 7 bridges, and as it goes in the land of make believe, there is a troll under every bridge! Each troll, quite rightly, insists that you pay a troll toll. Before you can cross their bridge, you have to give them half of the cakes you are carrying, but as they are kind trolls, they each give you back a single cake.

questions.question: Two children were on their way to school, when they began to question what day of the week it was. They were so confused in their reckoning that one of them gave the following riddle to help sort the matter out: When the day after tomorrow is yesterday, then today will be as far from Sunday as that day was which was today when the day before yesterday was tomorrow!
I have eight to spare, in case I lose my one.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a cat

questions.question: Three goddesses were sitting in an old Indian temple. Their names were Truth (who always tells the truth), Lie (who is always lying) and Wisdom (who sometimes lies). In order to figure out which goddess was which you posed the following questions to each:

options.text: king the left one: Who is sitting next to you?
king the middle one: Who are you?
d at last question for the right one: Who is your neighbor?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1. Wisdom 2. Lie 3. Truth

questions.question: In the Halo series, Zealots use Energy Swords.
In what fictional city is the TV show Futurama set?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New New York

questions.question: What is a SPARTAN in the Halo series?

options.text: A higher ranking soldier than a ODST
Troopers that went through military training at the age of five

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: How did the Alimbics become extinct in the Metroid series?

options.text: They discovered Phazon and developed Phazon Madness causing them to wipe each other out.
The entire species used up their life energy to imprison Gorea.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The entire species used up their life energy to imprison Gorea.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New Mombasa

Who made the fictional Mother Brain and for what purpose?

options.text: The Galactic Federation built her as a next generation Aurora Unit.
It is unknown who made her but she was made to control Zebes.
The Space Pirates built her to be one of their generals.
The Chozo built her to be a organic Supercomputer.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Chozo built her to be a organic Supercomputer.
